name: Root Note
description:
Your planet's inhabitants are in dire need of some groovy melodies! Capture Seeds of the instrument they desire, and plant the trees near them to satisfy their needs! Everyone needs a little music in their life, right?

Controls:

Android: Tap and hold forward to move, drag left or right to turn, shake phone to swing net, blow into microphone to plant seeds

PC:  Click and drag to move and turn, P to swing net, O(letter) to plant seeds

Team Members:
John Scovic- Lead Design, Sound, Programming
DON - Lead Programming, Design
Thomas Newsome - Modeling, Texturing
